name: sorsari-breaking-the-surface
description: Audio-visual experience for Breaking The Surface by SORSARI

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run swap-refs
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: terser dist/script.js -o dist/script.min.js -c -m && terser dist/model-animations.js -o dist/model-animations.min.js -c -m && terser dist/stars.js -o dist/stars.min.js -c -m && terser dist/visualizer.js -o dist/visualizer.min.js -c -m && terser dist/debug.js -o dist/debug.min.js -c -m && terser dist/ascii-shader.js -o dist/ascii-shader.min.js -c -m && terser dist/bar-visualizer.js -o dist/bar-visualizer.min.js -c -m && terser dist/dither-easter-egg.js -o dist/dither-easter-egg.min.js -c -m && terser dist/audio-worker.js -o dist/audio-worker.min.js -c -m
scripts.swap-refs: sed -i.bak 's/dist\/\([a-z-]*\)\.js/dist\/\1.min.js/g' index.html && sed -i.bak 's/dist\/style\.css/dist\/style.min.css/g' index.html && rm -f index.html.bak
